wikipedia_page.main: John Race Godfrey Tomlinson  FCP (24 April 1932 – 6 August 2005) was a British educationalist. After serving as Director of Education for Cheshire from 1972 to 1984, he was Professor of Education at the University of Warwick from 1985 to 1997.

response: *John Tomlinson, Baron Tomlinson  (born 1939), Lord Tomlinson of Walsall, former MP and MEP
**John Tomlinson, Baron Tomlinson (born 1939), Lord Tomlinson of Walsall, former MP and MEP

* Prof John Tomlinson CBE, Professor of Education from 1985 to 1997 at the University of Warwick, Director of Education for Cheshire from 1972 to 1984, and Chairman of National Institute for Careers Education and Counselling (NICEC, and part of the Careers Research and Advisory Centre) 1985–89
